name: Shop Drifter
description:
In this project which is an extended game jam game, you control the physics-based character Cartboy. I completed the game's programming and level design in my spare time. Although I wrote the source code as modular as I could, I don't plan to turn it into a full game at the moment.

Note: The coolest part about the game is rail-riding but it looks like Unity's particle system doesn't work well on web browsers and I later noticed even the post processing doesn't work so I have decided to cut out the WebGL version. Feel free to try the Windows version! Any comments are welcomed.
